description:
High ranking officer of the Tokugawa shogunate. Served as minister of finance (勘定奉行, Kanjō Bugyō) of the Tokugawa-Shogunate, later as foreign minister.
http://wiki.samurai-archives.com/index.php?title=Kawaji_Toshiakira
He supports the Edo vaccination clinic with 500 ryu of funding he originally got as a bribe against the clinic from Taki Seisai.
name: Kawaji Toshiakira
